title: Chat issues strike again

replies.body: Same here says logging onto chat service yet i just played a game, added a player from  that game and received commendation how does that one work? Thought i had some sort of chat ban XD

Got the same issue, most likely someone at riot spilled their hard-earned coffee on the server or something. 

Staying patient, but a day without league is like a day without meth.

Love you riot, keep working.

Thanks for the heads up on this!  It looks like some players might be having issues connecting to chat right now.  I don't have further information to provide just yet, but it's being worked on so you can get back in chatting with friends.  Hang tight!

Update:  We are now tracking this on our [server status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw)page for updates.
